metadata.synopsis: Lae'zel reacts to what she has just learned from the tiefling she questioned - and if the player didn't let her speak, she is mighty pissed about it, though her anger should be quite cool at this stage. Zaith'isk = ZAY-thisk. Kainyank = CANE-yank.

31.speaker: Lae'zel
31.text: The last time a subordinate questioned my judgement, I ate tongue stew that very night.

51.speaker: Player
51.text: I warned you, didn't I? You ought to reconsider keeping her around, before she causes real trouble.

52.speaker: Shadowheart
52.text: I warned you, didn't I? You ought to reconsider keeping her around, before she causes real trouble.

50.speaker: Player
50.text: Subordinate? No - we're partners. You'll treat me with respect.
50.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel is unhappy to be corrected. Her eyes should roll upwards.

35.speaker: Player
35.text: Subordinate? No - we're partners. You'll treat me with respect.
35.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel is unhappy to be corrected. Her eyes should roll upwards.

26.speaker: Lae'zel
26.text: Kainyank. Your tantrum proves you no wiser than a hatchling.

4.speaker: Lae'zel
4.text: The teeth-ling was clear. If there are githyanki west of here, that must be our objective. Purification cannot wait.

5.speaker: Lae'zel
5.text: Kainyank. Your tantrum proves you no wiser than a hatchling.

54.speaker: Lae'zel
54.text: Had you allowed me to speak, we would not be left without a plan.

30.speaker: Lae'zel
30.text: We scout the roads and scan the skies for children of Gith. Purification cannot wait.

56.speaker: Player
56.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel is unhappy to be corrected. Her eyes should roll upwards.

64.speaker: Lae'zel
64.text: Then I needn't make it again.

62.speaker: Lae'zel
62.text: Tsk. Had you allowed me to speak, we would not be left without a plan.

59.speaker: Player
59.text: If you've finished scowling at me, what comes next?
59.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel is unhappy to be corrected. Her eyes should roll upwards.

49.speaker: Lae'zel
49.text: The teeth-ling was clear. If there are githyanki west of here, that must be our objective. Purification cannot wait.
49.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel is unhappy to be corrected. Her eyes should roll upwards.

14.speaker: Player
14.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel is unhappy to be corrected. Her eyes should roll upwards.

53.speaker: Player
53.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel is unhappy to be corrected. Her eyes should roll upwards.

45.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel is unhappy to be corrected. Her eyes should roll upwards.

72.speaker: Lae'zel
72.context: NodeContext: Said through her teeth. She is NOT happy about being corrected.

70.speaker: Lae'zel
70.text: I am unfamiliar with the - well, I shall not say 'culture'. 'Custom', perhaps.

11.speaker: Lae'zel
11.text: You will educate me on matters of this Fay-run.

43.speaker: Lae'zel
43.text: The crèche holds the zaith'isk. It will cleanse us of the parasite.

61.speaker: Lae'zel
61.text: By covenant, I can say no more.

33.speaker: Lae'zel
33.text: Tsk. I might have a plan had you allowed me to speak.

40.speaker: Lae'zel
40.text: We scout the roads and scan the skies for children of Gith. Purification cannot wait.

47.speaker: Player
47.text: You will speak to drow with respect.

57.speaker: Player
57.text: We are githyanki. You will approach with respect.

37.speaker: Player
37.text: You shouldn't have to be so rough with him.

22.speaker: Player
22.text: Goodness me - that's a terrible way to make friends. Must you be so rough?

20.speaker: Player
20.text: Such cruelty. Is your heart really so cold?

63.speaker: Lae'zel
63.text: The locals prove compliant. A useful trait.
63.context: CinematicNodeContext: Rising anger, but not shouty anger: very, very cold.NodeContext: Rising anger, but not shouty anger: very, very cold.

25.speaker: Player
25.text: Do you plan to be that rough with everyone we meet?
25.context: CinematicNodeContext: Rising anger, but not shouty anger: very, very cold.NodeContext: Rising anger, but not shouty anger: very, very cold.

29.speaker: Lae'zel
29.context: CinematicNodeContext: Rising anger, but not shouty anger: very, very cold.NodeContext: Rising anger, but not shouty anger: very, very cold.

28.speaker: Lae'zel
28.text: Soon, you will be vomiting blood and tearing apart your own flesh.
28.context: CinematicNodeContext: Anger still rising. But never yelling.NodeContext: Anger still rising. But never yelling.

69.speaker: Lae'zel
69.text: When the tentacles sprout from your lips, will you still cry that I was rough?
69.context: CinematicNodeContext: Angry, but ice, ice cold. No outward rage.NodeContext: Angry, but ice, ice cold. No outward rage.

12.speaker: Player
12.text: Enough. Just tell me what's our next move.

42.speaker: Player
42.text: All right. You made your point.

17.speaker: Lae'zel
17.text: Then I needn't make it again.

3.speaker: Player
3.text: You're a dab hand at interrogations - we might need that skill again.

21.speaker: Lae'zel
21.text: Chk. A shell so thin requires little to crack it.

44.speaker: Player
44.text: Zorru was an easy mark. Don't get complacent.

38.speaker: Lae'zel
38.text: Chk. A thin shell requires little to crack it. I will apply more pressure should the situation demand.

19.speaker: Player
19.text: Goodness me - we'll make no friends that way. Must you be so rough?

65.speaker: Lae'zel
65.text: I beg your pardon. Was I too rough?

34.speaker: Player
34.text: You shouldn't have to be so rough with him.
34.context: CinematicNodeContext: Angry, but ice, ice cold. No outward rage.NodeContext: Angry, but ice, ice cold. No outward rage.

27.speaker: Player
27.context: CinematicNodeContext: Angry, but ice, ice cold. No outward rage.NodeContext: Angry, but ice, ice cold. No outward rage.

6.speaker: Lae'zel
6.text: Cockroaches are survivors. Yet I do not congratulate them.

71.speaker: Player
71.text: Such cruelty. Is your heart really so cold?
71.context: CinematicNodeContext: Angry, but ice, ice cold. No outward rage.NodeContext: Angry, but ice, ice cold. No outward rage.

32.speaker: Lae'zel
32.context: CinematicNodeContext: Angry, but ice, ice cold. No outward rage.NodeContext: Angry, but ice, ice cold. No outward rage.

18.speaker: Lae'zel
18.text: Soon, you will be vomiting blood and tearing apart your own flesh.
18.context: CinematicNodeContext: Angry, but ice, ice cold. No outward rage.NodeContext: Angry, but ice, ice cold. No outward rage.

13.speaker: Lae'zel
13.text: When the tentacles sprout from your lips, will you still cry that I was cold?
13.context: CinematicNodeContext: Angry, but ice, ice cold. No outward rage.NodeContext: Angry, but ice, ice cold. No outward rage.
